Page 1: Once upon a time, in the heart of a bustling city, there was a tranquil place called, the Calma Space Study House. Here, a vivacious young girl named Sewar, with light skin and brown hair, was often found, curled up under a warm, sunlit window. Page

2: Sewar found joy in studying in the Calma Space Study House because it was always quiet and peaceful. She spent countless hours pouring over books, her face lit up in the Golden sunlight. Her graduation day was approaching, and she was filled with excitement and endless dreams.
